## Plan Rate across States

```{r, results='asis'}
plot(gvisGeoChart(AvgGroup, 'StateCode', 'Avg', 
                        options = list(region = "US", 
                                       displayMode = "regions", 
                                       resolution = "provinces",
                                       colorAxis = "{colors: ['#e0f3db', '#a8ddb5', '#43a2ca']}",
                                       datalessRegionColor = '#ffffff')), "chart")
```
